channel.description:
#### What happened? This all occurred on the same night: -Player A (me) was the Cult Leader -Player B was a Ritualist who used Strength of Corax -Player A Eradicated Player C -Player D (I believe a Physician) visited Player C -Player A receives the same message that Player D received.
